content: in a court case one party was ordered to cover the procedural costs although the specific amount was not mentioned the case lasted for 9 months and the court made a final resolution the case involved two parties sion and the republic of estonia and the court partially upheld sions action against estonia the case involved the division of joint property in a condominium owned by nv the court ordered nv to pay compensation for property loss and granted consent to register the apartment in the land registry department both parties were ordered to bear the costs of the proceedings the judgment will be sent to the parties and they have the right to file an appeal within 30 days the case originated from an action brought by lv for the division of joint property after a divorce the claimant believes the apartment is worth eur 50000 and wants it divided equally between the parties the defendant wants exclusive ownership of the property and to pay the claimant eur 25000 the defendant disputed the price of the apartment and agreed to pay eur 11000 the court explained the process and ordered both parties to provide evidence after considering the evidence the court upheld the action in part and ordered the defendant to compensate the claimant the court also determined the value of the jointlyowned property the court will determine how the procedural costs will be allocated between the parties
